scan_metadata.description: autoscaling - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check for secrets in launch configuration
check_functions.description: Checks EC2 launch configuration for embedded secrets

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check capacity rebalance settings
check_functions.description: Verifies capacity rebalance is enabled for group

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check ELB health check settings
check_functions.description: Checks if ELB health check is enabled for group

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check public IP assignment
check_functions.description: Ensures no public IP is assigned in launch configuration

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check IMDSv2 requirement
Code Executable - API call to check multi-AZ configuration
check_functions.description: Checks if group spans multiple availability zones

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check multiple instance types
check_functions.description: Verifies group uses multiple instance types

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check EC2 launch template usage
check_functions.description: Checks if group uses EC2 launch template
